nodes.text: This male was part of the Mandalorian Death Watch during the Clone Wars.
Around 22 BBY, he and other Death Watch Mandalorians guarded the Death Watch hideout on the moon Concordia.

Later he, along with the other Mandalorians, started firing at Duchess Satine and Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi. He was ordered, along with two others, to deal with the Jedi. He and his two comrades activated their jetpacks and began firing at Kenobi. However, the Jedi was able to shoot him in the arm and he toppled to the ground, believed to be dead. Kenobi then threw a jetpack and shot it, killing the other two Mandalorians, but he was able to survive. He tackled Kenobi to the ground, only to have a rock thrown at his face by the Duchess. Kenobi then disarmed him and he fell to the ground.

Pre Vizsla then gave the order for the remaining Mandalorians to get to their shuttles and to leave Concordia, and that he'd deal with the Jedi himself. Vizsla and three other Mandalorians then approached the defeated Mandalorian. Annoyed that the Mandalorian was unable to kill the unarmed Jedi, Vizsla walked up to him, denounced him as a failure, and, before the warrior could speak, shot him at point-blank, killing him.
